title: Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition
body:
Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Companies: People Can Fly / Gearbox Software
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI9
Original Size: 9.7 GB
Repack Size: 4.8 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / LATER KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, partially compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: MegaUp (Uploaded by Sylvano, partially compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Bulletstorm.Full.Clip.Edition-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-bulletstorm.full.clip.edition.iso (10,402,201,600 bytes)
  • Duke Nukem’s Bulletstorm Tour DLC included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 9.7 to 4.8 GB)
  • Installation takes 3-6 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 11 GB
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in “Binaries\Win64” folder to change the game language

Game Description

Step into the boots of Grayson Hunt after a crash landing on an abandoned resort planet forces him to make a hard choice: survival or revenge. An exiled member of the elite assassin group Dead Echo, Grayson’s blind desire for vengeance finds his crew stranded on Stygia where he can finally confront the commander behind his betrayal—or get his team off the planet alive.

Battle your way through throngs of Stygia’s mutated inhabitants, performing masterful kills throughout the single-player campaign—or one of 30 competitive score-challenge or 12 co-operative multiplayer maps—using Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition’s unique “Skillshot” system that rewards you for executing the most creative and deadly kills imaginable.

Bulletstorm: Full Clip edition is the definitive Bulletstorm experience that includes all existing Bulletstorm add-ons, plus brand-new content exclusive to Full Clip!

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my first Bulletstorm repack.
